definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: Pakistan"s Chief of Army Staff Gen Ashfaq Parvez Kayani was also present during the ceremony."
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦陆军总参谋长也出席了授奖仪式。

sentences.english: It ' s the joint chief - of - staff , sir.
sentences.chinese: 是，参谋长联席会议主席，先生。

sentences.english: The vice-adviser advised the reviser to devise a device forgetting rid of vice.
sentences.chinese: 代办参谋倡议校正者想出一个铲除恶习的计谋。

sentences.english: 12Staff Sergeant James Waldo, 28, of Columbia, S.
sentences.chinese: 参谋军事詹姆斯沃尔多，28岁，哥伦比亚人。

sentences.english: But many of his troops, especially his protégés in the command structure, disagree.
sentences.chinese: 不过他的许多官兵尤其是司令部的参谋不这么看。

sentences.english: During the Second Balkan War he served as chief of the Operations Bureau of the 1st Cavalry Division.
sentences.chinese: 第二次巴尔干战争期间，担任第一骑兵师的作战参谋。

sentences.english: In 2006, he became director of operations for the Joint Staff at the Pentagon.
sentences.chinese: 2006年，他担任了五角大楼联合参谋部作战部长。

sentences.english: Chen Cheng, army chief of staff, declared the war would soon be over.
sentences.chinese: 蒋军参谋总长陈诚声言战争不久即可结束。

sentences.english: That winter he was assigned to the general staff of the People's Liberation Army.
sentences.chinese: 这年冬天他被派到人民解放军总参谋部工作。

sentences.english: Having said that, there are going to be tensions within the Democratic caucus, " said Harold M. Ickes, deputy chief of staff under President Clinton.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿手下的一名参谋长这样说。

sentences.english: He is a wise counselor in time of need.
sentences.chinese: 在困难时他是个好参谋。

sentences.english: Yang Xiu, a staff officer in ancient China, was killed for he didn't play his role properly in his work.
sentences.chinese: 杨修之被杀主要在于他没有正确发挥参谋作用。

sentences.english: Staff is the child of modern war.
sentences.chinese: 总参谋部是现代军事的产物。

sentences.english: That sort of controversial rhetoric recently led to Tamogami's ouster as the air force chief of staff.
sentences.chinese: 充满争议的措辞使得他近日被黜免空军参谋长的职位。

sentences.english: Later, he was ordered to serve again as GSO Grade 2 under Gen Chit Swe.
sentences.chinese: 后来，他奉命担任启遂将军麾下二级参谋处长。

sentences.english: Ho Ying-chin had been the Kuomintang's chief of the general staff and minister of national defence.
sentences.chinese: 何应钦，曾任国民党军参谋总长和国防部长。
